content: A messages haters who are trolls: Why do you have to violate people who do not look like you or do not believe like you? Are you so insecure that you have to strike out? If you were confident in the rightness of your view, you wouldn’t find it necessary to bother others. Let them “wallow” in their beliefs. Every time you commit violent acts you are saying that you really don’t think you’re as good as others. You have to harm them — physically or spiritually — like children. Have your beliefs but let others also follow their hearts and minds. Stop the violence. It’s at minimum childish and maximally a sign of derangement.
